item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: I tried all last week to get the University of Florida in Gainesville to get my dad in to see a neurologist. Although they promised every time to call his doctor immediately, they never did — doctors with their God Complex are always too busy. So no appointment was ever made. Fortunately, his physician got him to see a local neurologist. Should be just as good. My dad visited the neurologist today and he confirmed, apparently emphatically, that he does have hydrocephalus. I feel a lot more comfortable with that as do my parents. So next Thursday he goes in for his operation.
